description: TRESemmé SHAMPOO RESTORE & SHINE 350 MLYou are inspired by nature's beauty. You care for your hair. You want hair that is soft and smooth. Be inspired, be beautiful.Botanique Restore & Shine Conditioner, with our botanical blend of COCONUT and ALOE VERA, leaves hair feeling soft, smooth and looking beautiful.The specifically crafted formulas include our rich Botanical blend of coconut milk, coconut water and aloe vera. This system gently cleanses and restores smoothness and strength. Leaving it with brilliant natural-looking shine. No Parabens. No Dyes. Silicone Free. Safe for colour treated hair.HAIR CRAVING MORE?Treat your hair to our Restore & Shine Conditioner to restore smoothness and strength, leaving it with brilliant natural looking shine.OUR PHILOSOPHYFrom our origins in Salons in 1948, TRESemmé has been driven by a simple truth: every woman deserves to look & feel fabulous, like they've just stepped out of the salonTRESemmé is dedicated to creating haircare products that are salon quality. Inspired by stylist and salons, the products are designed to help you achieve salon gorgeous hair every day.TRESemmé. Professional. At your fingertips.Goes Well With: Tresemme Conditioner Restore and Shine <TRESemmé Botanique Restore & Shine Shampoo is a salon-quality formula with a blend natural ingredientsNow also contains coconut waterFeatures a botanical blend of coconut milk and aloe veraGently cleanses while smoothing and nourishing hairLeaves hair feeling moisturized and beautifully soft0% Dye, 0% Silicone
name: Tresemme Shampoo Botanique Restore Shine 350mL
